about_the_game:
D&D Classics: MC5 Monstrous Compendium Greyhawk Adventures Appendix (2e)

Prepare yourselves and your characters?. Here come more monsters, this time from the Greyhawk Campaign Setting! Adapted from these 64 pages filled with beasties and creatures, from aspis to zygon-and everything in-between! Crystalmist dragons (yes, there are more-four more, to be precise), and plenty of deadly plants await entry into your campaign. As always, these monster descriptions are organized on separate pages, ready to be incorporated into your Monstrous Compendium binder. And, you get four full-color dividers with identification tabs! Snap them in, and set them free! "
